scenario_text.value:
“Never fear, Minoru’s here!” ...Too cookie
cutter? But hmm, I do want it to sound familiar.

Huh, is that Minoru? What’s he muttering to
himself?

Hmm, maybe “you’ll rue the day you crossed
paths with Minoru!”

Yeah, that’s pretty cool. Then again, maybe
a superhero name would be better.

Still, I don’t really have any particular
symbol to base a name on. Hmmm...
Grrrrrr...

Man, everyone’s a critic. Why don’t you go
blog about it if you’re such a⁠—
...Huh?
Hey, Minoru! We got enemies!
Yow, Takuma? Did you hear all that?!

Who cares about that?! Look ahead, they’re
coming right for you!
Shishaaa!!!
Aw jeez... Eeeaaaugh!
Look out, Minoru!
Falcomon! You came for me, buddy?!

Wandering off on your own like a lost lamb!
Of course I found you spacing out here!

Hey come on, man. You’re making me feel
a little sheepish over here...
Grrrrrr...
Clearly this is no time for a spat...

Stand behind us, Takuma! And you, Minoru,
stand somewhere safe!
Okay! Come on, Minoru, let’s back off!

B-but if Falcomon’s fighting, I can’t be the
only one out of harm’s way...

I mean, a hero would never do something so
lame, would he?
Minoru?
I-I didn’t say nothing! And anyway!

I may not be able to do anything, but I can’t
just stand back and watch!
Igyaaahhh!
Hmph, then do as you please! Here they come!
